items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 30 check-ins with a photo.

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 315 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 64!

items.checkin_comment: Lovely proper pale ale from the Shire. Lovely rich maltiness, a hint of dried fruit in the middle and a solid but gentle bitter finish, nice. Preferred the old livery mind.
